title: Why isn't 2025 F1 season as close as predicted? The past explains why
summary: McLaren's breakthrough in a near-four-year-old ruleset shows F1 rules convergence is a myth – just like Sebastian Vettel, Red Bull and Renault did in 2013, writesMark Hughes

qa_pairs.question: Which team had a significant breakthrough in the 2025 F1 season?
What is the main theme discussed regarding the 2025 F1 season?
Which driver and team combination dominated in 2013, similar to the current situation in 2025?
